alexa.step1: 1. Tap "Skills & Games" in the menu, then search "ESP RainMaker Home".
alexa.step2: 2. Select "ESP RainMaker Home" and tap "ENABLE" to enable the Skill.
alexa.step3: 3. You will be redirected to the account link page. Type in your ESP RainMaker Home account and password. Then tap "Link Now" to link your ESP RainMaker Home account.
alexa.step4: 4. Once the account linking is successful, allow Alexa to discover your devices. Once the devices are successfully discovered, the setup is complete and you can start controlling them using Alexa.

googleAssistant.step1: 1. Open Google Home app and tap "Add" then "Set up device".
googleAssistant.step2: 2. Select "Works with Google" and search for "ESP RainMaker Home".
googleAssistant.step3: 3. Sign in with your ESP RainMaker Home account credentials to link your account.
googleAssistant.step4: 4. Once linked successfully, your devices will be available in Google Assistant. You can now control them with voice commands.
